title: How to Make Cinnamon Roll Rice Krispie Treats

steps.headline: Melt the butter in a large saucepan.
steps.description: Over a low heat setting, melt the butter to where it is nearly all liquid. Add the molasses, cinnamon, and salt.

steps.headline: Add the marshmallows.
steps.description: Combine and stir the butter and marshmallows until everything is melted thoroughly. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

steps.headline: Add and fold in the cereal.
steps.description: As you stir, it may become a challenge to get the cereal coated.

parts.name: Setting and Cutting the Rice Krispies Treats

steps.headline: Set the Rice Krispies.
steps.description: Spread the mixture in a 9"x13" greased baking dish. Use a greased spatula to quickly evenly spread it around.

steps.headline: Cut the treats into squares.
steps.description: Use a sharp, clean knife to cut them into even squares.

steps.headline: Form them into "cinnamon roll shapes".
steps.description: Cup your hands and gently round the edges of each square into a circle.

steps.headline: Make the frosting.
steps.description: Beat the ingredients with a hand or stand mixer.

steps.headline: Spread the frosting over the Rice Krispies.
steps.description: Use a spatula or the back of a spoon to evenly spread it around.

steps.headline: Garnish the Rice Krispies.
steps.description: Use a pinch or two of cinnamon and evenly sprinkle it around.

text: Making the Rice Krispies Treats Melt the butter in a large saucepan. Over a low heat setting, melt the butter to where it is nearly all liquid. Add the molasses, cinnamon, and salt. Add the marshmallows. Combine and stir the butter and marshmallows until everything is melted thoroughly. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract. Add and fold in the cereal. As you stir, it may become a challenge to get the cereal coated. Setting and Cutting the Rice Krispies Treats Set the Rice Krispies. Spread the mixture in a 9"x13" greased baking dish. Use a greased spatula to quickly evenly spread it around. Cut the treats into squares. Use a sharp, clean knife to cut them into even squares. Form them into "cinnamon roll shapes". Cup your hands and gently round the edges of each square into a circle. Make the frosting. Beat the ingredients with a hand or stand mixer. Spread the frosting over the Rice Krispies. Use a spatula or the back of a spoon to evenly spread it around. Garnish the Rice Krispies. Use a pinch or two of cinnamon and evenly sprinkle it around.
